channel.title: Reference on Ace, by DAISY
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on Ace, by DAISY

item.title: Command line interface
item.description: Overview The easiest way to run Ace is to type this on the command line: $ ace ~/Documents/book.epub You’ll then see a decription of Ace’s actions as it runs tests on the book. The JSON report is printed to the command line at the end (nothing is saved to disk; you need to specify --outdir for that). Example: info: Processing /Users/marisa/dev/epub-a11y-checker/samples/build/epub-a11y-tests-001.epub info: Parsing EPUB info: Analyzing accessibility metadata info: Checking package.

item.title: Http API
item.description: Starting the server After installing Ace, run the ace-http command from the terminal. There are a few options listed below. Ace by DAISY, an Accessibility Checker for EPUB Usage: ace-http [options] Options: -h, --help output usage information -v, --version output the version number -H, --host set the server's hostname (default: localhost) -p, --port set the server's port (default: 8000) -V, --verbose display verbose output -s, --silent do not display any output Examples $ ace-http -p 3000 API This API is available to client applications.

item.title: HTML Report
item.description: In this report, you’ll find a violations table, telling you which automated checks failed and why; and a series of sections containing extracted data, such as a headings outline and list of images, to highlight potential problem areas and to assist in manual checking. This report includes: Basic information about the book (Metadata details) A list of violations, organized into a (Violations) A summary of the publication’s TOC An outline view of all the headings in the publication, arranged in reading order.

item.title: JSON Report
item.description: Ace produces a JSON report based on the JSON-LD format and using the EARL vocabulary. Example report: { "@type": "earl:report", "@context": "http://ace.daisy.org/ns/ace-report.jsonld", "dct:title": "Ace Report", "dct:description": "Report on automated accessibility checks for EPUB", "dct:date": "10/10/2017, 12:00:00 PM", "earl:assertedBy": { "@type": "earl:software", "doap:name": "DAISY Ace", "doap:description": "DAISY Accessibility Checker for EPUB", "doap:homepage": "http://ace.daisy.org", "doap:created": "2017-07-01", "doap:release": { "doap:revision": "0.3.4" } }, "outlines": { "toc": "...", "headings": "...", "html": "..." }, "data": { "images": [ .
